title: Cloud - Configure S3 Bucket
description: A client needs a new, secure Amazon S3 bucket to store application backups.

tasks.description: Create a new S3 bucket in the client's AWS account.
Configure the bucket with private-only access, encryption-at-rest, and versioning enabled.
tasks.expected_outcome: The bucket is configured with security best practices.

tasks.description: Create a new IAM user with programmatic access restricted only to this new S3 bucket.
tasks.expected_outcome: A secure, least-privilege IAM user is created for the application.
